dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, one young apprentice named Eryndor Thorne sets out on a journey to reclaim the lost art.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a hidden library deep within the forest, where ancient scrolls hold the secrets of magic. I must find it before it's too late.

dialogues.speaker: Mysterious Stranger
dialogues.text: You're not the only one searching for the library, young apprentice. Be careful who you trust on your journey.
